nickname.minlength: Nickname must be at least 1 characters long.
nickname.maxlength: Nickname cannot be more than 20 characters long.

password.minlength: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
password.maxlength: Password cannot be more than 20 characters long.
password.invalid: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character.
